Html:
Hi all,
I would like to enable the typescript compilation in a vsix project, the browserlink extension project in sidewaffle package.
I tried to add a typescript file on it and save, but I don't see any file generated.
How can I do this?

luca

I think you should include following line in your project file.

<Import Project="$(VSToolsPath)\TypeScript\Microsoft.TypeScript.targets" />
